meanings.definition: Writings falsely attributed to a biblical character.
meanings.sent1: The pseudepigrapha claimed to be written by a famous figure.
meanings.sent2: Scholars study the pseudepigrapha to understand ancient texts.
meanings.sent3: The pseudepigrapha were like literary disguises for unknown authors.
meanings.sent4: Her stories were a pseudepigrapha, hiding her true identity.
meanings.sent5: The pseudepigrapha were like mysterious puzzles waiting to be solved.

meanings.definition: The body of texts written in the name of a biblical character but not considered part of the canonical Bible.
meanings.sent1: Many pseudepigrapha were excluded from the official scriptures.
meanings.sent2: People debate the authenticity of the pseudepigrapha.
meanings.sent3: The pseudepigrapha were like secret stories whispered in the shadows.
meanings.sent4: Her diary read like a personal pseudepigrapha of her favorite character.
meanings.sent5: The pseudepigrapha added layers of mystery to biblical history.
